tel_ran.tests.images.tools

Class TaskDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • tel_ran.tests.images.tools.ImageObject
      • tel_ran.tests.images.tools.TaskDescription

  • public class TaskDescription
extends ImageObject
    Class for ImageObject with only texts The text can be divided into several lines

      • TaskDescription

        public TaskDescription(java.lang.String text,
                       java.awt.Font font,
                       int max,
                       java.awt.font.FontRenderContext frc)
        This constructor fills all required fields
        Parameters:
        text - - the given text in one String variable. If it's length is more than maximum, the string will be divided in some lines. Otherwise there'll be created a new String array of length = 1.
        font - - Font for text
        max - - Maximum width of the lines in the text
        frc -
